content.prompt: Scholars believe that the conical tower of Great Zimbabwe functioned symbolically by referencing the form of a

choices.label: granary which recalled the generosity of the Shona ruler to his people
natural cave where the Shona ruler would present himself to his people
grave marker that affirmed the Shona rulerâ€™s connection to the ancestral past of his people
watchtower which demonstrated the Shona ruler would watch over and protect his people

topic.text: 6.3: Theories and Interpretations of African Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
